attributes.title: Please do not download
attributes.review: Shortly after I downloaded the app, my phone began to bug and glitch for several days. After I deleted it, all of the bugs stopped. I am very disappointed.

attributes.title: I almost died
attributes.review: I got on the app then weird people came to my house with trump mask on and they said that trump sent them and the demanded I got rid of my house and all my money now I’m on the streets with no food or blankets because of this app!!!!😡

attributes.title: Frick Donald Trump
attributes.review: I wanted to get the app to show my love to our orange cheetos. But then when i got the app my grandma died 😟. The cheetos killed my grandma :(. So I contacted him and he came to my house. And he killed my dog😭. So I bit the Ompa Lompa’s leg off. And he ran away crying :). in conclusion, donald trump is a murder🥱

attributes.title: terrible.
attributes.review: i would give this app 0 stars if i could. it’s terrible! i was hoping to find some answers to why i should vote for donald but NOPE. it glitched my phone like crazy. i have to delete the app and i will be voting biden in november.

attributes.title: The worst app
attributes.review: I hate this app I hope it gets less than 1 Star so it gets removed from the App Store. Why I’d rather watch 10 hours of kids cartoons then be on this horrible app for 10 minutes.

attributes.title: Lilhuddy😳æ💖hœ🤪hö✨udi🌲upa🐸pö😺pœ👄udï👏upæ🎂pupa😢bō🤠tsee🥵tsa🦟wæ✨
attributes.review: this app has a lot of glitches. it took about 4 hours to download when I had perfectly good WiFi. once I was in the app it keep glitching to a nasty orange face. I don’t know what it was, but all I am trying to do is make America better again.

attributes.title: Useless
attributes.review: I hated this app I am looking for information about who president trump really is and this just showed his stupidity...the app was also very very glitchy right from download and I am deleting it immediately

attributes.title: Absolute Trash
attributes.review: Not only has this highlighted the absolute worst aspects of humanity and the American people, but has truly saddened me for everything that needs to change and hopefully will when Gen Z fights for what is right

attributes.title: A Chair, But Make It Electric
attributes.review: The design in this app was genuinely horrible, just like the design in the 2020 Trump campaign. I don’t know why I expected anything more from this app than a disappointment, as that’s all Trump has given to America anyway.

attributes.title: Do not download
attributes.review: This made my phone glitch so bad that I had to take it to get it checked out to see the problem. So if u don’t want ur phone to be messed up I suggest not to download load this app!!
